sentences: Grégoire Maret (born May 13, 1975) is a jazz harmonica player.
Maret studied at Conservatoire de Musique de Genève, then The New School in New York City.
On March 13, 2012 Maret released his first album as a leader.
In 2003 he was the subject of Swiss filmmaker Frédéric Baillif's documentary Sideman.
